org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client

接口 WebClient.RequestBodyUriSpec

  • 所有超级接口:
    WebClient.RequestBodySpec, WebClient.RequestHeadersSpec<WebClient.RequestBodySpec>, WebClient.RequestHeadersUriSpec<WebClient.RequestBodySpec>, WebClient.UriSpec<WebClient.RequestBodySpec>
    封闭接口:
    WebClient

    public static interface WebClient.RequestBodyUriSpec
extends WebClient.RequestBodySpec, WebClient.RequestHeadersUriSpec<WebClient.RequestBodySpec>
    Contract for specifying request headers, body and URI for a request.

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient.RequestBodySpec

        body, body, body, contentLength, contentType, syncBody

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient.UriSpec

        uri, uri, uri, uri

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient.RequestHeadersSpec

        accept, acceptCharset, attribute, attributes, cookie, cookies, exchange, header, headers, ifModifiedSince, ifNoneMatch, retrieve
